```{r}

# Define coefficients
a <- 2
b <- -5
c <- -3

# Define the function to compute real roots
compute_real_roots <- function(a, b, c) {
  # Calculate discriminant
  disc <- b^2 - 4*a*c
  
  # Print discriminant value
  cat("Discriminant =", disc, "\n")
  
  # Check discriminant and compute roots
  if (disc > 0) {
    # Two distinct real roots
    root1 <- (-b + sqrt(disc)) / (2*a)
    root2 <- (-b - sqrt(disc)) / (2*a)
    cat("Two real roots:\n")
    cat("  Root 1 =", root1, "\n")
    cat("  Root 2 =", root2, "\n")
    
    # Return both roots as a vector
    return(c(root1, root2))
    
  } else if (disc == 0) {
    # One real root (repeated)
    root <- -b / (2*a)
    cat("One real root (double):\n")
    cat("  Root =", root, "\n")
    
    # Return the single root
    return(root)
    
  } else {
    # No real roots
    cat("No real roots (discriminant is negative)\n")
    return(NULL)
  }
}

# Test the function with the given coefficients
cat("Solving quadratic equation:", a, "x^2 +", b, "x +", c, "= 0\n")
roots <- compute_real_roots(a, b, c)

```

8.  **Read coefficients from file using a relative path**

    Edit `code/quadratic.qmd` so it reads `a`, `b`, `c` from
    `data/coefs.txt` using a **relative path**. In *this* document, show
    the R code you used (it should also appear in `quadratic.qmd`).

    ``` {r}        
# Read coefficients from file using relative path
coefs <- scan("data/coefs.txt", what = numeric(), quiet = TRUE)

# Assign coefficients
a <- coefs[1]
b <- coefs[2]
c <- coefs[3]

# Display the coefficients
cat("Coefficients read from file:\n")
cat("a =", a, ", b =", b, ", c =", c, "\n\n")

# Calculate discriminant
disc <- b^2 - 4*a*c
cat("Discriminant =", disc, "\n")

# Check discriminant and print real roots
if (disc < 0) {
  print("No real roots")
} else if (disc == 0) {
  # One real root (double root)
  root <- -b/(2*a)
  cat("One real root (double):", root, "\n")
} else {
  # Two real roots
  root1 <- (-b + sqrt(disc))/(2*a)
  root2 <- (-b - sqrt(disc))/(2*a)
  cat("Real roots:", root1, "and", root2, "\n")
}
